content.en: miRNA-disease associations: Scientists have been using computational methods to predict potential associations between microRNAs (miRNAs) and diseases. These methods, such as RWRMDA, NetGS, WBSMDA, NTSMDA, PBMDA, RKNNMDA, SDMMDA, HNMDA, NDAMDA, Benchmark, MSFSN, RWBRMDA, MAP, RWRMMDA, BIRWMDA, and MRWMDA, utilize algorithms to analyze biological datasets, network similarity, and miRNA structural and functional similarity. By integrating various data sources and applying these computational models, researchers aim to improve our understanding of miRNA-disease associations and potentially develop new strategies for disease diagnosis and treatment.
content.da: miRNA-sygdomsassociationer: Forskere har anvendt beregningsmetoder til at forudsige potentielle associationer mellem mikroRNA (miRNA) og sygdomme. Disse metoder, såsom RWRMDA, NetGS, WBSMDA, NTSMDA, PBMDA, RKNNMDA, SDMMDA, HNMDA, NDAMDA, Benchmark, MSFSN, RWBRMDA, MAP, RWRMMDA, BIRWMDA og MRWMDA, anvender algoritmer til at analysere biologiske datasæt, netværkslighed og miRNA's strukturelle og funktionelle lighed. Ved at integrere forskellige datakilder og anvende disse beregningsmodeller, sigter forskere mod at forbedre vores forståelse af miRNA-sygdomsassociationer og potentielt udvikle nye strategier til sygdomsdiagnose og behandling.
